snippet: At least 40 migrants died on an overcrowded smuggling boat north of Libya, and about 320 others aboard were saved by the Italian Navy.
abstract: Italian Navy patrol ship Cigala Fulgosi discovers over 20 bodies in boat hold while rescuing 312 migrants from rickety 50-foot vessel attempting to cross Mediterranean Sea; officials believe dead succumbed to carbon monoxide poisoning during voyage from Libyan coast; incident is only latest disaster involving migrants in region.
lead_paragraph: At least 40 migrants died on an overcrowded smuggling boat north of Libya, and about 320 others aboard were saved by the Italian Navy.

headline.main: 40 Migrants Found Dead in Sea Rescue
headline.print_headline: Migrants Die on Boat From Libya

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
